citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:55 am to 11:25
am on November 28, 2022. During that time the inspector waited at the facility, called phone number of file leaving a
message, and sent a text to the cell phone number of the licensee's spouse. Licensee's wife sent a text back to inspector
saying they were away for Thanksgiving. No other authorized person was available for inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:55 am to 11:25 
am on November 28, 2022. During that time the inspector waited at the facility, called phone number of file leaving a 
message, and sent a text to the cell phone number of the licensee's spouse. Licensee's wife sent a text back to inspector 
saying they were away for Thanksgiving. No other authorized person was available for inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
